duties_responsibilities.duty: Identify and engage potential clients within established network and beyond.
Utilize provided marketing materials to communicate the value of printing services.
Develop a deep understanding of products and services to address client needs.
Conduct presentations and demonstrations to showcase capabilities and offerings.
Negotiate terms and pricing with clients while maintaining a consultative approach.
Build and maintain strong relationships with clients to foster repeat business and referrals.
Keep accurate records of all sales activities and client interactions in the designated CRM system.
Stay informed about industry trends, competitors, and market developments.
Collaborate with the sales team to share insights, strategies, and best practices.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Sales, Business, or a related field (Master's preferred)
